description: Vietnam is considering cutting taxes on fuel to help ease prices at all-time highs, but inflation remains under control and helped by domestic food production, its finance minister said on Wednesday.
title: Vietnam considering fuel tax cuts amid inflation pressure - FinMin - Reuters

author: Reuters Editorial
description: 06/10 All three major U.S. stock indexes sank on Friday as a steeper-than-expected rise in U.S. consumer prices in May fueled investor worries about more aggressive interest rate hikes by the Federal Reserve. This report produced by Chris Dignam.

description: Turkey's Treasury said on Friday the fight against inflation remained the top priority in its macroeconomic policy and prudent fiscal policy would continue in the period ahead, with fiscal discipline never to be compromised.
title: Turkish Treasury says fight against inflation remains priority - Reuters.com
